subtasks: Plant a cover crop using a tractor and flail mower.
Weed the planted area by hand and track the time spent.
Use a no-till planting aid to plant transplants into the cover crop.
Evaluate the success of the cover crop in suppressing weeds and improving yields.
Adjust cover crop seeding methods based on results and equipment limitations.
Utilize a vegetable seeder and harrow to plant a diverse mix of cover crops.
Position farm roles and responsibilities, such as apprenticeship and core group participation.
Market and distribute products, both through CSA and local farmers markets.

tasks.task: Establish and manage cover crops using various methods.

Adjust cover cropping methods based on impact on weed pressure and yields.

tasks.task: Prepare soil for planting using minimal tillage techniques.

Apply hay mulch as an alternative to spading cover crops in.

tasks.task: Manage weeds using mechanical and manual methods.
subtasks: Use hand weeding for areas where cover cropping failed.
Attempt to control weeds using organic herbicides with limited success.

tasks.task: Maintain livestock for fertilizer.

Allow chickens to graze on cover crops to naturally fertilize the land.

subtasks: Use a tractor with a flail mower, no-till planting aid, and implements.

Market vegetables through a CSA and local farmers markets.
Utilize online systems for CSA distribution and marketing.

Abandon roller-crimper method in favor of traditional spading in of cover crops.

Plant tomatoes in both types of beds at two-foot spacing.
Water, weed, and monitor growth for yield comparisons.

subtasks: Position mobile chicken coops to move chickens to different areas.
Allow chickens to graze on cover crops and spread manure.

But all of these MAINTASKs consolidate the various physical tasks.

So, final answer with MAINTASKs and SubTasks as written above. Each MAINTASK is a generalization of multiple activities mentioned in the transcript, and the SubTasks are the smaller steps involved in each MAINTASK.

subtasks: MAINTASKS AND SUBTASKS:

tasks.task: Establish and manage cover crops using mechanical methods.
subtasks: Use a flail mower to plant cover crops (rye and vetch).
Attempt to implement a no-till planting aid for cover crop incorporation.
Evaluate the success of no-till planting compared to traditional tilling.
Hand weed areas where cover crop methods failed.
播种时有机除草剂的使用及效果测试。

tasks.task: Implement no-till planting techniques.
subtasks: Use a no-till planter to establish tomatoes and brassicas without tilling.
Adjust bedding methods based on soil moisture and cover crop health.

tasks.task: Manage weed populations using mechanical and manual methods.
subtasks: Weed brassica beds by hand despite using a cover crop.
Test organic herbicides on brassica weeds.

tasks.task: Utilize livestock for organic fertilization.
subtasks: Rotate chicken coops to graze on cover crops, distributing manure.
Provide shelter and nutrients through frequent chicken foraging.

tasks.task: Operate agricultural equipment for various farming tasks.
subtasks: Drive and maintain a flail mower for cover crop establishment.
Repurpose existing parts to assemble a no-till planting aid.
Calibrate and operate a seed drill for cover crop planting.
